sentences.en: “By investing in it, we can count it as an offset,” she said.
sentences.cn: 她说：“通过对其投资，我们可以把它视为一项补偿。”

sentences.en: At the outset this set of setting settled the offset problem of the kettle.
sentences.cn: 在开始，这一套设置解决了水壶的弥补问题。

sentences.en: Chemical recovery and water reuse values obviously must offset these costs.
sentences.cn: 化学品的回收和水的回用价值明显地补偿了这些费用.

sentences.en: Cuts in food prices will be offset by direct payments to farmers.
sentences.cn: 食品降价将通过直接付款给农民的方式进行补偿。

sentences.en: He was able to offset his travel expenses against tax.
sentences.cn: 他可以用旅费抵税。

sentences.en: How does the offset requirement work in practice?
sentences.cn: “补偿要求”在实践中怎样实施?

sentences.en: Offset requirements also vary between these areas.
sentences.cn: 补偿要求在这些地区也各有不同.

sentences.en: Prices have risen in order to offset the increased cost of materials.
sentences.cn: 为补偿原料成本的增加而提高了价格。

sentences.en: The decline in marriage has been offset by a rise in cohabitation.
sentences.cn: 结婚人数的减少由于同居人数的增加而得以弥补。

sentences.en: The effects of disturbances can be offset by reactions to the disturbance.
sentences.cn: 干扰的影响可以通过对干扰的反作用来弥补.

sentences.en: The gains offset the losses.
sentences.cn: 得失相当。

sentences.en: The higher operating costs can be offset against the cement clinker.
sentences.cn: 较高的费用能够靠水泥熟料得到弥补.

sentences.en: The increase in pay costs was more than offset by higher productivity.
sentences.cn: 提高的生产率抵消了增加的工资成本后仍有结余。

sentences.en: The multiplier on government spending might in fact be close to zero, as each extra dollar is almost entirely offset by increased private saving.
sentences.cn: 由于每一额外的一美元几乎完全被增长了的私人储蓄所抵消，政府开支乘数实际上可能接近于零。

sentences.en: The slowdown in domestic demand was offset by an increase in exports.
sentences.cn: 国内需求放缓和出口增长互相抵消了.

sentences.en: Their wage increases would be offset by higher prices.
sentences.cn: 他们增加的工资会被物价上涨所抵消.

sentences.en: These so - called merits are often offset by its undesirable effects.
sentences.cn: 这些 所谓 的好处往往被鞭炮产生的不良后果抵消了.

sentences.en: They jump their prices to offset heavy expenditures.
sentences.cn: 他们提高物价来抵销庞大的开支.

sentences.en: We offset the greater distance by the better road.
sentences.cn: 我们走远点,也要走较好的路.

sentences.en: What expenses can you offset against tax ?
sentences.cn: 什么开支可以获得税项减免？

words.tran_cn: 抵消，补偿；平版印刷；支管

phrases.tran_cn: 橡皮印刷机；胶版印刷机
胶版纸；胶版印刷纸；平版机上浆纸
胶印，平版印刷；胶版印刷；平板印刷
偏移曲面（设计软件3D MAX中的一个选项）
偏移电压；[光电]补偿电压

trans.tran_cn: 分支的，偏（离中）心的，抵消的，开端的
抵消，补偿；平版印刷；支管

trans.tran_en: to use one cost, payment or situation in order to cancel or reduce the effect of another

trans.tran_cn: 形成分支，长出分枝，装支管
抵消，补偿，（为了比较的目的而）把…并列（或并置），为（管道等）装支管
trans.tran_en: if the cost or amount of something offsets another cost or amount, the two things have an opposite effect so that the situation remains the same
